about.title: About TOP-X
about.subtitle: Rise to the Challenge! ‚öîÔ∏è
about.paragraph1: TOP-X is your ultimate arena for ego-bruising games, rankings, and viral showdowns. Think pyramids of glory (who's on top?), trivia takedowns, quizzes that test your vibe, and custom challenges where U vs X in real-time rivalries. Build, compete, rank, share - and trash-talk your way to the feed's throne. üìàüöÄ
about.paragraph2: Crafted 99% by Grok's genius ü§ñ (yep, that xAI powerhouse), with human vibe-coding for that extra spark üíñ. We're all about trends, tech, and turning scrolls into battles - weekly drops to keep you hooked.
about.paragraph3: Ready to rise? Sign in with X for full unlocks: save your wins, spy on friends' picks, climb leaderboards, and join our VIP crew for early access & input. Follow @topxapp for drops, RTs, and glory shots. Who's topping yours? Ready to top them all? Dive into a challenge now! üëâ top-x.co/challenges.
about.paragraph4: Got feedback, ideas or collabs? Hit us up: contact@top-x.co or DM @topxapp. Let's build the next big thing - together! üèÜ
about.metaDescription: Rise to the challenge at TOP-X, the Grok-powered arena for games, rankings, and viral showdowns.
faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Your TOP-X Quick Hits üöÄ
faq.intro: We've got answers to crush your doubts - ego-bruising style. U vs X? Dive in, play on, and claim the feed. Questions not covered? Hit us at contact@top-x.co. Who's topping yours? Let's find out! üìà‚öîÔ∏è
faq.metaDescription: Quick hits on TOP-X: Login, privacy, games, and more ego-bruising answers.
faq.items.login.question: Why log in to TOP-X?
faq.items.login.answer: Sign in to unleash the full glory: save your past plays, results & picks, climb leaderboards, spy on friends' picks, and trash-talk rivals. Without it? Fun previews only - no community showdowns or ego boosts. Log in & rise to the challenge! üîë
faq.items.security.question: Is logging in with X secure?
faq.items.security.answer: Absolutely! We use X's ironclad OAuth - minimal access, max privacy. No peeking at DMs, no posting on your behalf. Your data's locked down tighter than a vault in Fort Knox. üîíüí™
faq.items.permissions.question: What X permissions does TOP-X need?
faq.items.permissions.answer: Just the basics: your public profile (username + pic) for personalization - to prevent fakes and duplicate votes. We skip the rest - no private posts, no follows lists. Privacy first, ego-bruises second! üìã
faq.items.permissionPrompt.question: Why does X ask for several permissions?
faq.items.permissionPrompt.answer: X's default prompt is overkill - it's the bare minimum they allow for any app. Stuff like "protected posts" (locked accounts) or "who you follow/block"? We ignore it all. We only snag your username + pic - nothing else touches your feed. Promise: No meddling, no posting, just pure U vs X vibes. Chill & connect! üòé
faq.items.dataProtection.question: How is my data protected?
faq.items.dataProtection.answer: Firebase secures your info with top-tier encryption - minimal collection (just what you share), full privacy compliance. You control it all; we don't sell or snoop. Ego-bruises? Yes. Data drama? Never. üîíüõ°Ô∏è
faq.items.free.question: Is TOP-X free?
faq.items.free.answer: Totally free! All challenges are free. Jump in, play, compete, rank, flex, and top them all without dropping a dime. üÜìüèÜ
faq.items.unique.question: What makes TOP-X unique?
faq.items.unique.answer: We're Grok-powered (99% xAI magic ü§ñ) + human vibe-coded üíñ for that unbeatable edge. We ride trends like pros - weekly drops tailored to X's hottest buzz. Fast, techy, and ego-bruising: Pyramids for GOAT debates, trivia smackdowns, and viral rivalries. No stale games - fresh battles every week! ‚ö°üìà
faq.items.powered.question: What's the deal with "Powered by Grok 99%"?
faq.items.powered.answer: Grok (xAI's powerhouse) built 99% of TOP-X: code, games, content, even marketing sparks. It's like having an AI wizard on speed-dial for trend-riding glory. Humans add the final 1% vibe-code for that human spark. Grok crunches, we perfect the punch! ü§ñüî•
faq.items.vibeCoding.question: What's vibe-coding?
faq.items.vibeCoding.answer: Vibe-coding is our secret sauce: Humans tweaking Grok's 99% AI output for that irresistible feel - cheeky, competitive, trend-connected. It's not just code; it's ego-bruising energy, trash-talk tweaks, and U vs X flair. Grok crunches the tech; we code the vibes. üíñ‚öîÔ∏è
faq.items.games.question: What games & challenges are available?
faq.items.games.answer: Pyramids of glory (rank GOATs like football legends or prez rivalries), trivia takedowns (test your smarts vs the feed), quizzes that bruise egos, and many more mini-games, ego-busters and showdowns. More dropping weekly. Rise, rival, conquer! üéÆüìä
faq.items.howToPlay.question: How do I play & what's recommended?
faq.items.howToPlay.answer: Easy: Pick a challenge (pyramids, trivia, quizzes or other), build/rank/quiz/play away, then share for trash-talk gold. Start with a pyramid - stack your GOATs, log in for leaderboards, follow players for friends/rival peeks. Pro tip: Share everywhere (X, WhatsApp, Facebook, Instagram) to rally your crew. Top them all! üéØ
faq.items.sharing.question: Can I share my pyramids, results, or game stuff?
faq.items.sharing.answer: Heck yeah - we encourage it! Grab the image, paste our pre-copied text, and flex on X or anywhere. It rallies more players, unlocks community results, and lets you spy who's topping yours. Win-win ego glory! üì∏üèÜ
faq.items.shareWithFriends.question: How do I share with friends?
faq.items.shareWithFriends.answer: Easy ego-flex: Hit the share button after a challenge - it auto-downloads your image (pyramid, trivia score, etc.) and copies custom text. Paste into X, WhatsApp, or anywhere - tag your crew, trash-talk, and rally them to top yours. Pre-loaded with our URL for viral vibes. Share & top 'em all! üì∏üë•
faq.items.noX.question: If I don't have X, what can I do?
faq.items.noX.answer: Open an X account here - Seriously, how do you live without it? üòú It's just two seconds! Or jump in without logging in - half the features (like results, leaderboards, following) won't unlock, but you can still play challenges and share images on other platforms (WhatsApp, Facebook, etc.). Ego-bruise lite mode! üì±
faq.items.follow.question: Why follow @topxapp?
faq.items.follow.answer: For the inside scoop: Weekly drops, RTs of your wins, glory shots (spotlights & scores), and trend alerts. It's your feed's ego-boost HQ - follow @topxapp & stay ahead of the rivalries! üëÄüìå
faq.items.future.question: What's next for TOP-X?
faq.items.future.answer: Grok 4's dropping epic upgrades soon. Weekly challenges synced to X storms: More pyramids, polls, mini games and challenges at the speed of a keystroke. Shaped by your feedback - join the VIP crew for input! We've got tons more surprises in store, but Grok recommends keeping mum for now. Stay tuned & top the future! üöÄüìà
faq.items.whyReading.question: Why am I still reading this FAQ instead of logging in & playing?
faq.items.whyReading.answer: Probably overthinking the ego-bruise... or scared you won't top 'em all? üòè Nah, you're ready - take the leap, sign in securely, and claim the throne. U vs X starts now! Dive into challenges üëâ top-x.co/challenges. Who's on top? You tell us! ‚öîÔ∏è

terms.hero.title: Terms of Use
terms.hero.subtitle: Effective Date: July 17, 2025
terms.sections.1.title: Welcome to TOP-X
terms.sections.1.body: By using our games and services, you agree to follow these terms. TOP-X is built for friendly competition and shared entertainment. Users must be 18+ (or have guardian approval) and comply with local laws when creating or sharing content.
terms.sections.2.title: Player responsibilities
terms.sections.2.body: Keep your account secure, respect community guidelines, and avoid harmful or offensive submissions. We reserve the right to moderate, remove content, or suspend accounts that violate the vibe.
terms.sections.3.title: Updates to the terms
terms.sections.3.body: We may update these terms as the platform evolves. Significant changes will be announced through the app or email. Continued use after updates indicates acceptance.
terms.cta.label: Back to home
terms.meta.title: TOP-X Terms of Use
terms.meta.description: Terms of Use for the TOP-X gaming platform, covering player responsibilities and policies.
